document_data.name: ''Gandrel's Aspiration''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gandrel's Aspiration''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[heavy crossbow]] that belonged to the [[Gur]] monster hunter named [[Gandrel]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Gandrel's Aspiration'' possessed a ''+1'' enchantment that guided the [[bolt]]s towards their targets and increased their damage. The crossbow also possessed magic that made it especially effective against [[monstrosities]].
document_data.History: Gandrel named his heavy crossbow after the incident he witnessed at seven years old – a [[vampire spawn]] being burned at the stake. In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the Gur carried this crossbow while hunting for the vampire spawn named [[Astarion Ancunín]] across the [[Western Heartlands]] and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]].
